title: Splash Screen Display and Transition
description: Verify the custom splash screen displays correctly on app launch and only dismisses after all fonts and necessary assets are fully loaded.

steps.description: Launch the app
Verify the custom splash screen is visible immediately on start
Wait until font loading completes
Wait until asset loading completes
Confirm splash screen disappears only after fonts and assets are fully loaded

title: Tab Navigation Functionality
description: Ensure that the tab navigation displays all three tabs (Diamond, Stone, Opal) and allows instant switching without delay or errors.

steps.description: Launch app and wait for splash screen dismissal
Verify the presence of three tabs labeled Diamond, Stone, and Opal
Tap the Diamond tab
Confirm the Diamond gem 3D model is displayed
Tap the Stone tab
Confirm the Stone gem 3D model is displayed
Tap the Opal tab
Confirm the Opal gem 3D model is displayed

title: 3D Model Rendering and Animation
description: Verify the Gem3D component properly loads, textures, rotates, and animates the 3D gemstone models smoothly.

steps.description: Select each gem tab (Diamond, Stone, Opal) one by one
Confirm the 3D GLB model loads from the downloaded asset path without errors
Verify the gemstone is textured correctly
Observe that the model is continuously rotating smoothly with no stuttering
Validate smooth animations throughout the model display

title: Asset Downloading for Production Compatibility
description: Test the asset downloading mechanism ensures bundled asset URIs are correctly converted to accessible file paths in production builds without causing memory errors.

steps.description: Launch the app in a production build environment
Confirm the Gem3D component uses downloadAsync to download assets
Verify that asset paths used for 3D models are valid file paths, not raw bundled URIs
Check that memory errors do not occur during or after asset downloading

title: App Stability Across JS Engines and Code Minification
description: Verify the app stability and performance by running it with different JavaScript engines (Hermes vs JSC) and with code minification disabled.

steps.description: Build and launch the app using Hermes engine with code minification enabled
Confirm no crashes or rendering errors during app startup or use
Build and launch the app using JSC engine with code minification disabled as per configuration
Confirm app runs smoothly without crashes or JS errors

title: OpenGL Context Initialization and Fallback Logic
description: Test the OpenGL context initialization for 3D rendering and validate fallback logic triggers simplified GLView rendering on failures.

steps.description: Launch the app on devices with different OpenGL capabilities
Verify OpenGL context initialization succeeds on supported devices
Simulate or launch on a device/environment with poor or absent GL support
Confirm fallback logic triggers simplified GLView rendering without app crashes

title: Error Handling on Asset Load Failures
description: Verify the app gracefully handles errors that occur if 3D model assets fail to load, displaying appropriate error messages or UI states.

steps.description: Force asset loading failure by corrupting or removing a model file from production bundle
Navigate to the tab linked to the corrupted/missing asset
Check the app does not crash
Confirm a user-friendly error message or UI placeholder is displayed indicating model failed to load

title: Memory Usage and Leak Prevention During 3D Rendering
description: Monitor memory consumption during prolonged interaction with 3D models to verify no memory leaks or spikes degrade app performance.

steps.description: Open each gemstone tab and interact with 3D view for extended period (e.g., 30 minutes)
Monitor memory usage remains stable without increasing continuously
Verify no noticeable lag, stutter, or app crashes occur due to memory issues

title: UI Responsiveness During Model Loading
description: Validate the tab navigation remains responsive and no UI freezes occur while 3D assets are loading asynchronously.

steps.description: Switch rapidly between Diamond, Stone, and Opal tabs repeatedly
Verify tabs switch instantly without UI delay or freeze
Confirm 3D models load eventually even under rapid tab switching

title: App Initialization with Global Providers and Configuration Setup
description: Verify the root layout properly initializes app including loading global providers, fonts, and configuration settings before user interaction.

steps.description: Launch the app
Verify global providers (e.g., theme, state) are initialized correctly without errors
Confirm fonts are loaded before splash screen completes
Validate configuration settings are applied correctly for the session
